S02madadh_u:2_0: [1] evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma /
S02madadh_u:2_2_0: tatrāyuṣmān rāhulo 'tīva viheṭhyate devagrahair nāgagrahair yakṣagrahai rākṣasagrahaiḥ
S02madadh_u:2_2_1: kinnaragrahair garuḍagrahair mahoragagrahair manuṣyagrahair amanuṣyagrahaiḥ pretagrahair
S02madadh_u:2_2_2: bhūtagrahaiḥ piśācagrahaiḥ kumbhāṇḍagrahair dvīpibhiḥ kākair ulūkaiḥ kīṭaiḥ sarīsṛpaiṛ
S02madadh_u:3_0_0: [2] athāyuṣmān rāhulo yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau
S02madadh_u:3_0_1: śirasābhivanditvā bhagavantaṃ tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ purato rudann aśrūṇi
S02madadh_u:4_0: [3] atha bhagavān jānann eva rāhulam āmantrayate sma /
S02madadh_u:4_1: kiṃ tvaṃ rāhula mama purataḥ sthitvā aśrūṇi pravartayasi /
S02madadh_u:4_2: evam ukte āyuṣmān rāhulo bhagavantam etad avocat /
S02madadh_u:4_5_0: so 'haṃ bhagavaṃs tatra viheṭhye devagrahair nāgagrahair yakṣagrahai rākṣasagrahaiḥ
S02madadh_u:4_5_1: kinnaragrahair garuḍagrahair mahoragagrahair manuṣyagrahair amanuṣyagrahaiḥ pretagrahair
S02madadh_u:4_5_2: bhūtagrahaiḥ piśācagrahaiḥ kumbhāṇḍagrahair dvīpibhiḥ kākair ulūkaiḥ kīṭaiḥ sarīsṛpair
S02madadh_u:5_0: [4] atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ rāhulam āmantrayate sma /
S02madadh_u:5_1: udgṛhṇa tvaṃ rāhula imāṃ mahādaṇḍadhāraṇīṃ vidyām /
S02madadh_u:5_2: catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnām upāsakānām upāsikānāṃ ca dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya bhaviṣyati /
S02madadh_u:6_0_0: [5] tadyathā / aṅgā / vaṅgā / bhaṅgā / varaṅgā / saṃsārataraṅgā / sāsadaṅgā / bhaṅgā /
S02madadh_u:6_0_1: jesurā / ekatarā / ara vīrā / tara vīrā / kara vīrā / kara kara vīrā / indrā / indrakisarā /
S02madadh_u:6_0_2: haṃsā / haṃsakisarā / picimalā / mahākiccā / viheṭhikā / kālucchikā / aṅgodarā /
S02madadh_u:6_0_3: jayā / jayālikā / velā / elā / cintāli / cili cili / hili hili / sumati / vasumati /
S02madadh_u:6_0_4: culu naṭṭe / culu culu naṭṭe / culu nāḍi / kunāḍi / hārīṭaki / kārīṭaki / gauri /
S02madadh_u:6_0_5: gandhāri / caṇḍāli / mātaṅgi / dharaṇi dhāraṇi / uṣṭrapālike / kaca kārike / cala
S02madadh_u:6_0_6: nāṭike / kākalike / lalamati / rakṣamati / varākule / manmate utpale / kara vīre /
S02madadh_u:6_0_7: tara vīre / tara tara vīre / kuru vīre / kuru kuru vīre / curu vīre / curu curu vīre /
S02madadh_u:6_0_8: mahāvīre / iramati / varamati / rakṣamati / sarvārthasādhani / paramārthasādhani /
S02madadh_u:6_0_9: apratihate / indro rājā / yamo rājā / varuṇo rājā / kubero rājā / manasvī rājā /
S02madadh_u:6_0_10: vāsukī rājā / daṇḍāgnī rājā / brahmā sahasrādhipatī rājā / buddho bhagavān dharmasvāmī
S02madadh_u:6_1: anuttaro lokānukampakaḥ / mama sarvasattvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kurvantu /
S02madadh_u:6_2: paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kurvantu /
S02madadh_u:7_0_0: [6] tadyathā / balavati / varamati / talamati / lakṣamati / rakṣamati / huru huru /
S02madadh_u:7_0_1: phuru phuru / cara cara / khara khara / khuru khuru / mati mati / bhūmicaṇḍe / kālikeṭi /
S02madadh_u:7_0_2: akisalā / pīne / sāmalate / hūle sthūle / sthūlaśikhare / jaya sthūle / jaya naṭṭe /
S02madadh_u:7_0_3: cala nāsi / culu nāsi / vāgbandhani / virohaṇi / solohite / aṇḍare / paṇḍare / karāle /
S02madadh_u:7_0_4: kinnare / keyūre / ketumati / bhūtaṃgame / bhūtamati / dhanye / maṅgalye / mahābalalohitamūle /
S02madadh_u:7_0_5: acalacaṇḍe / dhuraṃdharā / jayālike / jayā / gorohaṇi / curu curu / rundha rundha /
S02madadh_u:7_0_6: dhuru dhuru / khuru khuru / khurumati / bandhumati / dhuraṃdhare / dhare dhare /
S02madadh_u:7_0_7: vidhare vimati / viṣkambhaṇi / nāśani vināśani / bandhani / mokṣaṇi / mocani / mohani /
S02madadh_u:7_0_8: bhāvani / śodhani / saṃśodhani viśodhani / saṃkhiraṇi / saṃchindani / sādhu turumāṇe /
S02madadh_u:7_0_9: hara hara bandhumati / hiri hiri / khiri khiri / kharali / huru huru / piṅgale /
S02madadh_u:8_0_0: [7] asyāṃ khalu rāhula mahādaṇḍadhāraṇyāṃ vidyāyām antaśo 'ṣṭottaraśatapadānāṃ sūtraṃ
S02madadh_u:8_0_1: granthiṃ baddhāyāṃ hastena dhāryamāṇāyāṃ kaṇṭhena dhāryamāṇāyāṃ samantād yojanaśatasya
S02madadh_u:8_1: gandhair vā puṣpair vā mudrābhir vā naiva manuṣyo vāmanuṣyo vābhibhaviṣyati /
S02madadh_u:8_2: na viṣaṃ na śastraṃ na rogo na jvaro na prajvaro na vidyāmantro na vetāḍaḥ /
S02madadh_u:8_3: na vyādhau nāgnau na viṣodakena kālaṃ kariṣyati /
S02madadh_u:8_4: vidyāmantraprayogānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ sādhuprayuktānāṃ ca bandhanī /
S02madadh_u:8_7: vajrapāṇiś cāsya mahāyakṣasenāpatir vajreṇādīptena samprajvālitena ekajvālībhūtena dhyāyitvā mūrdhānaṃ sphoṭayet /
S02madadh_u:8_8: catvāraś ca mahārājāno 'yomayena cakreṇa kṣuradhārāprahāreṇa vināśayeyuḥ /
S02madadh_u:9_0: [8] asyāṃ khalu rāhula mahādaṇḍadhāraṇyāṃ vidyāyāṃ sakṛtparivartitāyāṃ rājacaurodakāgniviṣaśastrāṭavīkāntāraparvatadurgamadhyagataḥ sarvabhayebhyaḥ pratimucyate /
S02madadh_u:9_1_0: iyaṃ khalu mahādaṇḍadhāraṇīvidyā ekanavatigaṅgānadīvālikāsamair buddhair bhāṣitā
S02madadh_u:9_2: sarvabhayopadraveṣu mama sarvasattvānāṃ ca śivam ārogyaṃ bhavatu /
S02madadh_u:10_0: [9] idam avocad bhagavān āttamanā āyuṣmān rāhulo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti /
